sub_title: I am open to new management challenges as International Consultant: Manager Dairy Farming and Forage Crop production
summary:
Professional highly skilled in all aspects of the farm business, farm manager with a wide range of international experience on large scale and small scale dairy farms all over the world.

Specialist in construction of large scale and small-scale dairy farms all over the world.

Forage crop manager.

Hooftrimming and fertility specialist.

Crisis manager on the dairy farms.

Training specialist in dairy industry.

My contact details: mobile nr. +31 6 2200 1455
e-mail: mennojellema@hotmail.com
